arg.g: the Brazillian soccer star Pele, and the American Basketball star Michael Jordan, and the Spanish motorcycle star Miguel Anduren, and the steam bike star Angel Nyytw, in addition to his teammate in Real Madrid Raul Gonzalez

arg.g: the delegations of the two Koreas
that they marched together at the summer Olympic games in 2000 in Sydney
